p: Meanwhile, the estimated rate of severe and/or critical disease cases per 100 persons in the nine select countries was highest in Italy at 14.7 and lowest in Pakistan at 5.0 ( Fig 4B). Across world regions, the median per 100 persons was 3.3 (range: 0.0–11.3) in AFRO, 7.1 (range: 0.3–9.5) in EMRO, 7.7 (range: 4.1–11.9) in SEARO, 8.7 in AMRO (range: 5.0–13.5), 11.5 (range: 5.0–15.5) in WPRO, and 13.0 (range: 4.7–14.7) in EURO, and 8.0 (range: 0.0–15.5) globally.
